item.title: Banker (Level 6)
item.description: Join two or more development histories together with git merge.

item.title: Hunter (Level 4)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Master Blacksmith (Level 9)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 3)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 2)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Apprentice Hunter (Level 1)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Master Investigator (Level 7)
item.description: Used git blame to annotate a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Master Author (Level 10)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Master Seamstress (Level 9)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Archivist (Level 6)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Master Collector (Level 10)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Garage Inventor
item.description: Used a custom alias for a Git command

item.title: Master Miller (Level 9)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 1692 times with git add -p.

item.title: Butcher (Level 6)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Investigator (Level 6)
item.description: Used git blame to annotate a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Master Cleaning lady (Level 7)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Apprentice Fisherman (Level 2)
item.description: Look for specified patterns in the current repository with git grep.

item.title: Master Miller (Level 8)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 1345 times with git add -p.

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 8)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Master Locksmith (Level 7)
item.description: Add Signed-off-by line at the end of the commit log message using git commit -s.
